modName: No more irritating female yawn sound
summary: This is a replacer of the sound voice generic of femalesultry voice. In Skyrim you can hear sometimes NPCs yawning there is one yawning sound what I think its really annoying so I made this replacer.
descriptionHtml:
In Skyrim some sounds are annoying, so I think a female yawn sound of a kind of NPC (femalesultry) was really annoying, because its sounds like an orgasm, really xP, so the work I made was take time to search on the voices.bsa file I extracted the file, then convert the correct sound files (them are on Fuz format) to wav to hear them and search the sound I wanted, it take some time to find the file because are named with numbers and codes. Also I made this mod for others, I know will be useful for some :)Â 

By the way I have to say I have the game in spanish, maybe If you have the game in other language you will hear other sound, but its supposed to be similar, so the mod replaces that file anyway


InstallationManual

Put the file on the Skyrim path folder:Data\sound\voice\skyrim.esm\femalesultryI recommend to install it with Nexus mod managerTools used:

-Unfuzer

-Winrar

Here is the link of the video where you can hear the sound what is silenced, If the uploaded video on nexus doesn't working:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oQy80fQhSHw



Enjoy :)By Maredark3d
author: Maredark3d
